_meanings:
{@--2@} Ancient, old, of long 
standing (as a custom).

{@--3@} Nobly born,
of a good family.

{@--4@} Brought up in
the service of a king for 
generations, holding office from ancient 

times, hereditary; <ls>Ms. 7. 54</ls>;  
<ls>R. 19 57.</ls>

An old or hereditary
minister; ({#prakftayaH#}) 
{#mOlErAnAyayAmAsurBarataM staMBitASraBiH#} <ls>R. 12. 12</ls>,  
<ls n="R.">14. 10</ls>; <ls n="R.">18. 38</ls>.
